#labels Instructions,HowTo
#Instructions to make TiseanGUI work on MS Windows.

= Introduction =

This are a collection of tips to allow users of tiseanGUI to work under Windows. This instructions apply to Windows XP. 


= Installation of PyGTK =

The best way to install PyGTK on Windows XP is to use the Alberto Ruiz's all-in-one package that you can find with instructions in the following link:

http://aruiz.typepad.com/siliconisland/2006/12/allinone_win32_.html

in this site you can also find instructions to perform a full installation of pyGTK on Windows.
